attributes.action: For the FA to disolve the national football team. They don't care why should we?
attributes.additional_details: The amount of money that people spend must be astronomical. If you bought a washing machine that didn't even try to wash or clothes you'd ask for a refund. However long suffering England fans constantly have to put up with the same excuses. 'We were tired' 'the conditions were to hot for us' ' I can't wait for this to finish so I can go on holiday'. Correction they never say the last but we all know it's the truth. I'm not getting paid for this interruption to my summer so why should I bother!
attributes.background: After watching the England national football team for many years I have come to one conclusion. They don't care so why should we? Would it not be simpler for use to get rid of the national team or at least play it with amateurs that may put up a little fight?
